name: login
description: To get started, you can use any web development IDE.  1. Create a New Project.  2. Create the following new files:    * `index.html`   * `main.css`   * `script.js` 3. Add general structure to `index.html` with a link to your CSS file: ```html <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head>   <title>Login</title>   <link rel = "stylesheet" href = "main.css"> </head> <body> </body> </html> ```
